attributes.action: Ban posh people from using the word "mate"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years now, my fellow Englishmen have had to endure the annoying sound of posh people speaking. Everything was perfectly OK until i had the misfortune of hearing a particularly snooty sounding man calling somebody "Mate"... PLEASE OUTLAW ALL POSH PEOPLE FROM USING THIS WORD!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
